recipesJson.name: PB Choco Banana Pancakes - LIVE MIXING
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
Banana Pancakes with Chocolate Chips topped with Peanut Butter
Made on Live Mixing
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3_5nWP0Khs

reviews.text: So good. I mixed this up Thursday and vaped on Sunday. Love the way the banana and peanut butter play off each other. The bakery note is spot on and its already a nice, clean smooth vape. I am willing to bet a couple more days and it will be even smoother. This was a winner Wayne!
This is fucking delicious bro absolutely PACKED full of flavour and beautifully balanced. MB Cookie bite really does wonders in this recipe great choice Wayne. Ty üëçüèª
